title: Revenue of Mattel 's Barbie brand worldwide from 2012 to 2019
yAxis: Gross sales in million U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Gross sales in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2012.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2017.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2017 to 2016.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2015.
gold: This statistic shows the gross sales of Mattel 's Barbie brand worldwide from 2012 to 2019 . In 2019 , Mattel 's Barbie brand generated gross sales amounting to about 1.16 billion U.S. dollars , up from about 1.09 billion U.S. dollars the year before . Additional information on Mattel 's Barbie Since the launch of Mattel 's Barbie fashion doll in 1959 , Barbie has become a cultural icon in America and around the world .
